markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0+"
    pfs=""
>
[Snare Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=51)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 291 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This kit contains tools and materials for creating snares. A snare kit allows you to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) snares using the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill. You can draw and replace a worn snare kit as part of the action to use it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Snare Kit
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Snare Kit (Specialist)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 291 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

---

A specialist snare kit gives you a +1 item bonus to the check.
